snippet: Spain’s High Court on Thursday gave two former senior executives at bailed-out lender Bankia and its predecessor Caja Madrid three days to hand over several million euros as it investigates claims of misuse of company credit cards.
abstract: Spain's High Court gives two former executives at bailed-out lender Bankia three days to hand over several million euros as it investigates claims of misuse of company credit cards.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s High Court on Thursday gave two former senior executives at bailed-out lender Bankia and its predecessor Caja Madrid three days to hand over several million euros as it investigates claims of misuse of company credit cards.

headline.main: Spanish High Court Orders Ex-Bankers to Deposit Millions
headline.print_headline: Spanish High Court Orders Ex-Bankers to Deposit Millions
